review: Spent an entire Friday evening trying to troubleshoot this thing. It wont recognize my network password. I have entered it a dozen times. I know what it is, but I double checked thinking maybe it was changed.. it was not changed. I have reset my modem, I have restarted the fire stick, I have tried the number on the bottom of the modem for good measure, nothing is working. I have several Apple products and they have always been easy breezy to set up. I am majorly disappointed and probably going to send it back for a refund. I really thought this would be a cool gadget but after a long week this was the last way I wanted to spend my Friday night. UPDATE: I posted on the help forum and was given a link for technical assistance. I chose the "call me now" option and was called by a man with a muffled voice who was talking over me, very fast, and when I told him I could not understand what he was saying, he actually HUNG UP ON ME. Nice.
